ComicInfo.Title: Connection Part 1 of 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don't miss Part 1 of the 2-part SERIES FINALE! It's the penultimate chapter in the latest Five Year Mission of the U.S.S. Enterprise, as Captain Kirk and the crew encounter... themselves? Celebrate the 50th Anniversary of STAR TREK with this all-new story that brings two timelines together!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tony Shasteen | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Josh Adams & Adam Guzowski | 2 | Sub-B | ROM Subscription Cover B | Drew Moss & Adam Guzowski | 3 | RE | Supply Pod Exclusive Variant Cover | Tony Shasteen | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 05:22:10. [CVDB539159]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Drew Moss, Josh Adams, Tony Shasteen, Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.Inker: Drew Moss, Josh Adams, Tony Shasteen, Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Guzowski, Drew Moss, Josh Adams, Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.Characters: Hikaru Sulu, James T. Kirk, Keenser, Leonard McCoy, Montgomery Scott, Nyota Uhura, Pavel Chekov, Science Officer 0718, Spock, Zahra
